entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 07:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

Humidity: 88 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this morning then to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snow over northern sections. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
